ci_column = np.array([[13.0], [10.0], [10.0]])
column_mask = np.array([[True], [True], [True]])
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=10.0, regions=[(0, 3,
    0, 1)], row_slope=0.0)
mean_of_columns = pattern.mean_charge_in_all_image_columns(column=ci_column,
    column_mask=column_mask)
assert mean_of_columns == [None]
